channel.name: SKY Racing 2 AU
channel.title: Sky Racing 2 Raceday
channel.desc: Thoroughbreds from Ashburton, Urawa Japan, Penn National, Charles Town, Remington Park, Lone Star Park; Greyhound Racing from The Gardens, Goulburn, Warragul, Townsville, Q1 Lakeside, Gawler, Addington, Hatrick; Harness Racing from Winton, Alexandra Park, Flamboro Downs, Mohawk, Hoosier Park, Yonkers.
